item.description:
Want to try all the best dishes from local restaurants in a fun party atmosphere? Phantom Gourmet is running a food festival to do just that! Door price gets you all-you-can eat once inside and there are parties going on at all the bars and restaurants.

Let's all meet there and have a great time! Tickets are just $30 for a limited time available from the tickets link on thier website: http://foodfest.phant...

We'll send out an email with a meeting place inside the event once we get closer to the date.

Q&A from Phantom Gourmet's website...

How much are tickets and where can I get them?
For a limited time tickets are $30! Tickets are $40 in advance and $50 at the door if available.
Click links on homepage for details.

When is the event?
Saturday September 25, 2010
Noon-5PM (gates will close at 4PM, there will be no entry after that time)

Where is the event?
On Lansdowne and Ipswich Street behind Fenway Park.

When should I arrive?
We recommend arriving no later than 1PM.
Does the ticket include food and drink?
The ticket includes sampling of 80 of Phantom's favorite foods and entry into Lansdowne Streets famous clubs. Beverage is not included.


What does the VIP ticket include?
It includes access to Ernie Boch Junior's special party.
Also special catered food from your favorite Food Festival Stars and early
entry to the event.

Will there be other beverages beside beer?
Yes: soda, and water.

Can infants or children attend?
No, this event is strictly 21 plus, proper I.D. is required.

I'm obviously over 21 years old. Do I need I.D.?
Yes, every person will need to present valid identification.
A valid driver's license
A valid State Liquor ID
A valid US passport
A valid active duty Military ID
All other forms of ID may be acceptable, but does not guarantee service of Alcoholic Beverages or entry.

How can I get there by public transportation?
There are T stops within walking distance.
Take the Green Line to the Kenmore stop using any Green Line train, except the E. If on the Green Line - D branch, use the Fenway stop. Pedicabs will be available at both green line stops

Can I bring a cooler, bag, food, drinks or my pet?
No.

What about will call?
Will call will be in front of Game On.
Will call will be open from 11am-2pm
You must present valid I.D. to prove that the will call tickets are yours,
then you'll be admitted.

Do all the people in the group for my will call order need to pick up
tickets at the same time?
No, however, the person in your group who bought the tickets will need to
authorize someone else to pick up those tickets.
Any questions about purchased tickets please contact
Ace Ticket at 1800 MY SEATS
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside in front of the House of Blues at 12:30.
item.name: Phantom Gourmet Food Festival
